comment._content: "A ferry service across the Clyde ran from 1891 until the bridge was opened in 1956. " from en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Batemans_Bay#European_history So pre-1956. I think it is about 1938 like many of these railway carriage photos.

comment._content: In 1939 my grandfather moved to Moruya and my mother used to complain about how difficult it was to get there
